newsitem.title: GHANA: Ghana bourse boosted by Ashanti and Mobil.
newsitem.headline: Ghana bourse boosted by Ashanti and Mobil.

text.p: The Ghana bourse rose on the week to Friday, fueled by gains by Ashanti Goldfields Co Ltd and Mobil Oil Ghana Ltd, its market report showed.
The Ghana Stock Exchange All-Share index edged up 0.49 points on Friday to 358.11, compared with Wednesday's close. The index closed at 355.29 the previous Friday.
Offers outstripped bids at 1,190,170 to 409,230. A moderate 238,170 shares changed hands.
Mobil (up 100 cedis to 5,200 cedis) matched the 100 cedis gain it made on Wednesday.
Consumer products company Unilever (+5 to 760) was the only other riser on Friday. There were no fallers.
Ashanti jumped 190 cedis to 21,100 on Wednesday after rising 90 cedis on Monday.
